name: static-sharing
description: node scripts supplementary to static-sharing repo

scripts.watch-test: bash -c 'watchexec --exts ts --only-emit-events --emit-events-to=json-stdio | while read line; do echo received: $line; echo "Skipped $(timeout 1 cat | wc -l) further events"; npm run test $1; done' _

author: Steven Lu
